input.sentences: my friends and i visited a sports museum recently .
there was sports memorabilia as far as the eye could see .
they even had clothing worn by professional athletes on display .
my favorite display featured a computer you could click around on and get information about different items on the wall .
and did i mention how awesome the outside of the museum was ? it was all glass and looked totally flat .
